name: Prawn Noodle Soup - Penang Hokkien Mee
recipeIngredient: 6 rashers sliced bacon (or cubed pork belly),
20 large prawns (peeled, reserving shells for stock),
recipeInstructions: 1. In a small pan heat the sugar with 15 ml of water until it turns rich and brown.
2. Add the sugar to the stock and mix well.
3. In a heavy pan deep fry the bacon or pork belly and set aside.
4. Using a perforated ladle of sieve, plunge the noodles into the hot stock for 1 minute to heat through.
5. Remove the noodles and divide into the bowls.
6. Add the prawns to the stock and cook for 1 minute, then remove with a slotted spoon and divide between the bowls.
7. Add the beansprouts to the bowls.
8. Ladle the stock into the bowls.
9. Garnish with bacon and spring onions.
